sections.paragraphs: This article is about [[communication]]s systems in [[Anguilla]].

sections.title: Telephone
sections.paragraphs:
'''Telephones - main lines in use:''' 6,200 (2002) :''country comparison to the world:'' 212 '''Telephones - mobile cellular:''' 1,800 (2002) :''country comparison to the world:'' 211 '''Telephone system:'''
''Domestic:'' Modern internal telephone system
''International:'' EAST CARIBBEAN FIBRE SYSTEM [[ECFS (cable system)]]
'' microwave radio relay to island of Saint Martin ([[Guadeloupe]] and [[Netherlands Antilles]])

sections.title: Mobile Phone (GSM)
sections.paragraphs:
'''Mobile Phone Operators:
''' Cable & Wireless (Anguilla) Ltd. - GSM 850 and 1900 MHz with Island-wide coverage {{cite web|author=Mybmobile.com Whois Lookup |url=http://anguilla.mybmobile.com/anguilla/ |title=Mybmobile.com Whois Lookup |publisher=Anguilla.mybmobile.com |date= |accessdate=2012-08-13}}
''' Weblinks - [https://web.archive.org/web/20051228040009/http://www.weblinks.ai/] '''Mobiles:''' ? (2007)
